title: ARAM
body:
Just had the weirdest ARAM ever. 3 members of the enemy team build movespeed and ran to our fountain all game, giving us heaps of kills. I gathered they were just trolling, but the weirdest part was our soraka, was instantly level 6 when the game started, everyone in the game could see it and she used ult. Bug maybe?

{{champion:39}}
